## PDB Statistics 

Import out PDB statistics CSV file and calculate precent strucutres by experimental method 
```{r}
p <- read.csv("Data Export Summary.csv", row.names = 1)
```


```{r}
percent <- (p$Total/sum(p$Total)) *100
names(percent) <-  row.names(p)
percent

```
